name: BubblegumGun
description:
A first person, time trial. 

Jam up the robots with your bubblegum gun to try and get a high score as time runs out. But don't worry you can increase your time with items all around the map.

Get the highest score you can and earn a bronze, silver or gold medal. Why not screen shot it and use #bubblegumgun to show off on twitter?
